fullText: This revival of Larry Kramer's 1985 drama about the early days of the AIDS crisis crackles with an urgency that feels both period-appropriate and entirely contemporary.
dtliExcerpt: This revival of Larry Kramer's 1985 drama about the early days of the AIDS crisis crackles with an urgency that feels both period-appropriate and entirely contemporary.
